body_html:
I don't think I explained my concern correctly. Consider this subclass (nonsensical as it is):

class StatefullFormPage extends AbstractFormPage {
  state = {
    subclassState: 42,
  }
  // ... required methods ...
}

Since this class sets its own state in the class definition, it would erase the state from AbstractFormPage, right? The same issue applies if the state is set in the constructor. I guess it doesn't matter in this case since the value is undefined either way.
